feed.title: Wallabag Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Wallabag: 2.6.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix same domain pagination by @yguedidi in https://github.com/wallabag/wallabag/pull/7266
  • Upgrade PHP dependencies by @yguedidi in https://github.com/wallabag/wallabag/pull/7272
  • Use a proper "how to" for elCurator by @j0k3r in https://github.com/wallabag/wallabag/pull/7323
  • Prepare 2.6.9 by @j0k3r in https://github.com/wallabag/wallabag/pull/7395

Full Changelog: https://github.com/wallabag/wallabag/compare/2.6.8...2.6.9

entry.title: New release for Wallabag: 2.6.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update site config & tests by @j0k3r in https://github.com/wallabag/wallabag/pull/7582
  • Update site config by @yguedidi in https://github.com/wallabag/wallabag/pull/7623
  • Replaced gitter with matrix by @nicosomb in https://github.com/wallabag/wallabag/pull/7753
  • Added Omnivore Import by @nicosomb in https://github.com/wallabag/wallabag/pull/7754

Full Changelog: https://github.com/wallabag/wallabag/compare/2.6.9...2.6.10

entry.title: New release for Wallabag: 2.6.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix redirection after action in search results by @nicosomb in https://github.com/wallabag/wallabag/pull/7827
  • Fix title tag filter by @nicosomb in https://github.com/wallabag/wallabag/pull/7846
  • Change NB_ELEMENTS in pocket importer to 30 by @j0k3r in https://github.com/wallabag/wallabag/pull/7993
  • Fix entries counter for annotated entries in the menu by @j0k3r in https://github.com/wallabag/wallabag/pull/7999
  • Fix multiple CSRF vulnerabilities by @yguedidi GHSA-5pm7-cp8f-p2c2

Full Changelog: https://github.com/wallabag/wallabag/compare/2.6.10...2.6.11

entry.title: New release for Wallabag: 2.6.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix changelog by @yguedidi in https://github.com/wallabag/wallabag/pull/8135
  • Update dependencies by @yguedidi in https://github.com/wallabag/wallabag/pull/8136
  • Prepare 2.6.12 release by @yguedidi in https://github.com/wallabag/wallabag/pull/8137

Full Changelog: https://github.com/wallabag/wallabag/compare/2.6.11...2.6.12

entry.title: New release for Wallabag: 2.6.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Avoid non-validated OTP to be enabled by @j0k3r in https://github.com/wallabag/wallabag/pull/8139
  • Add j0k3r/php-readability:1.2.10 as a dependency by @nicosomb in https://github.com/wallabag/wallabag/pull/8194
  • Backport Pocket and Shaarli imports from master by @nicosomb in https://github.com/wallabag/wallabag/pull/8193
  • Add support of Pocket CSV import by @Kdecherf in https://github.com/wallabag/wallabag/pull/8240
  • Update j0k3r/graby-site-config by @nicosomb in https://github.com/wallabag/wallabag/pull/8250
  • Prepare 2.6.13 release by @nicosomb in https://github.com/wallabag/wallabag/pull/8229

Full Changelog: https://github.com/wallabag/wallabag/compare/2.6.12...2.6.13
